title: Must Read: Consumers Are Reportedly Shopping Secondhand in Response to Tariffs, Tapestry Files Trademark Infringement Suit Against Shein
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday. In its 13th resale report, ThredUp reported that 59% of consumers are seeking more affordable shopping options, such as purchasing items secondhand, in response to new government policies around tariffs making new apparel more ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
